thread.title: Kim Kardashian sparks rumours she's trying for a baby
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian sparks rumours she's trying for a baby

title: Kim Kardashian sparks rumours she's trying for a baby
text: Buy now Pregnancy times? One Tweeter, seemingly delighted about the prospect of the clothing line, penned a funny note reading: 'RT if you're getting pregnant in time for the Kim + Kanye kids line launch' Mellow yellow: On Tuesday, the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star opted to use North to model designs from her forthcoming kids range, with the adorable tot dazzling in a sweet yellow dress paired with a shearling jacket In what looked like a heavy hint, Kim responded with a bevy of Emojis, complete with a series of laughing faces, an image of a woman raising her hand in agreement, a set of babies and a number of images of girls with their hair in pigtails. As ever, her social media movements were watched by many of her eye-popping 49.9million followers, with one delighted fan writing: '@KimKardashian are you saying you're pregnant Kim??' She then responded with an indignant: 'Def not' accompanied by another laughing face, yet the response did not dispel any interest over her trying for a child. Deffo not! She then responded with an indignant: 'Def not' accompanied by another laughing face, yet the response did not dispel any interest over her trying for a child Holding on tight: In yet more candid insights into her family life, she answered some questions regarding Saint and North, with one fan asking if Saint was a 'cry baby' In yet more candid insights into her family life, she answered some questions regarding Saint and North, with one fan asking if Saint was a 'cry baby'. She wrote back to her follower: 'Nope! He's so good but omg he has my same cry face.... poor guy!' Her 'cry face' is in reference to her now-iconic image when she sobs, as pointed out by her sister Kourtney in an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians in 2015. Nope! She wrote back to her follower: 'Nope! He's so good but omg he has my same cry face.... poor guy!' Iconic: Her 'cry face' is in reference to her now-iconic image when she sobs, as pointed out by her sister Kourtney in an episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians in 2015 As Kim was left bereft and sobbing, her unforgiving older sister said: 'I start laughing at Kim when she's crying because I just can't help it, she has this ugly crying face that she makes.' A fan also shared a snap showing North holding on to Saint in a loving pose, although Kim was quick to insist life was not as harmonious as it appeared at first glance. When the Tweeter wrote: 'north seems to be an amazing sister! This is so cute', Kim hit back: 'This was a rare moment. She is really amazing at pushing him and crying when I hold him though'. Rare moment of peace! When the Tweeter wrote: 'north seems to be an amazing sister! This is so cute', Kim hit back: 'This was a rare moment. She is really amazing at pushing him and crying when I hold him though' Despite suspicions over the Kardashian-West clan's expansion, in July last year she revealed in an episode of KUWTK that she was reluctant to have baby number three due to a change in her intimate areas. Speaking to Scott Disick, the former partner of her sister Kourtney, she said: 'I was like: "I don't think I can carry another one". I just think: "Ugh, I'll never be the same down there." Kanye says it like feels the same. 'It's the fact that like something that big has come in and out of there. Things are just different internally. There's just like bumps and curves, you know what I'm saying? It's just not the same.' Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
